```{r}
book_animals <- c("brown bear", "red bird", "yellow duck", "blue horse")
for (i in seq_along(book_animals)){
  print(paste0(book_animals[i], ", ", book_animals[i], " what do you you see? I see a ", book_animals[i+1], " looking at me" ))
}
```
